import React, { useState } from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faThumbsUp } from "@fortawesome/free-regular-svg-icons"; const Reels = () => { const [reels, setReels] = useState([ { id: 1, user: "John Doe", videoUrl: "https://via.placeholder.com/500x1000?text=Reel+1", description: "Amazing trip to the mountains!", likes: 120, comments: 15, shares: 5, avatar: "https://via.placeholder.com/40?text=John", }, { id: 2, user: "Jane Smith", videoUrl: "https://via.placeholder.com/500x1000?text=Reel+2", description: "Had an awesome workout today!", likes: 95, comments: 10, shares: 3, avatar: "https://via.placeholder.com/40?text=Jane", }, // Add more reels here... ]); return (
{/* Header Section */}

Reels

{/* Reels Feed */}
{reels.map((reel) => (
{/* Reel Video */}
{/* Reel Info */}

{reel.user}

{reel.description}

{/* Interaction buttons */}
))}
); }; export default Reels;
